## CalendarDateInfo type

Caldendar date info used to represent a date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type CalendarDateInfo = {
    day: number;
    month: number;
    year: number;
    disabled?: boolean;
    selected?: boolean;
};
```
